apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, this couple emoji beautifully illustrates a connection between two people, represented by a woman with dark skin tone and a person with light skin tone, encircled by a vibrant red heart. Apple's polished 3D design imbues the figures with warmth and personality, while the glowing heart symbolizes love, partnership, and deep affection. It's a heartwarming way to express romantic feelings or celebrate a loving bond.
